code: import{useEffect}from"react";import hoverEffect from"hover-effect";import cloud from"../assets/images/cloud.png";export var useHoverEffect=function useHoverEffect(el,img1,img2){useEffect(function(){new hoverEffect({parent:el.current,image1:img1,image2:img2,displacementImage:cloud,intensity:0.3});},[el,img1,img2]);};
